tool.name: read_trainers
tool.description: Reads data about the trainers present in the organisation from the database. Gives information such as the trainer name, email address, unique id, short description (trainer overview) and long description (complete qualifications). It does not require any input.
tool.response: A JSON list of all the trainer records.

tool.name: send_email

input.name: destination_email
input.description: The exact email address of the receiver.

input.name: email_subject
input.description: The subject line of the email being sent.

input.name: email_body
input.description: The body of the email being sent.

tool.response: A string containing the message if the email was sent successfully or not.
